summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for the account of Gratitude America, Ltd. It details account balances, transactions, and service charges for the period from August 1, 2016, to August 31, 2016. The statement includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and interest payments.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Account Statement Summary
events.description: Summary of account transactions and balances for Gratitude America, Ltd. for the month of August 2016.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, 113 St Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of August 31, 2016, was $1,486,816.52.
The statement includes an interest payment of $252.52 for the month.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees for the statement period.
The document outlines procedures for reporting errors in transactions.
The account is held at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
